thread.title: M.Jones
thread.title_full: Rubber Stamp Champ reviewed by M.Jones

author: M.Jones
title: M.Jones
text: I was looking for a personal stamp for my handmade cards when I came across Rubber Stamp Champ. I thought this site was business centric until I saw their examples of Teacher and Holiday Stamps; which got me to explore the site further. I was able to easily customize the stamp I wanted and with the stamp preview I was able to make modifications to the font, size and line spacing. There was also an option to add artwork, which I did not utilize; I may use this feature on my next purchase. I was very please with the amount of time it took them to create and mail the stamp. I love my stamp and will use this company again!
